about.description:
Zstandard is a real-time compression algorithm, providing high compression
ratios. It offers a very wide range of compression / speed trade-off, while
being backed by a very fast decoder. It also offers a special mode for
small data, called dictionary compression, and can create dictionaries from
any sample set. Zstandard library is provided as open source software using
a BSD license.

name: zstd-static
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.19.2
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: zstd-static
    version: 1.4.5
source:
    fn: zstd-1.4.5.tar.gz
    sha256: 98e91c7c6bf162bf90e4e70fdbc41a8188b9fa8de5ad840c401198014406ce9e
    url: https://github.com/facebook/zstd/releases/download/v1.4.5/zstd-1.4.5.tar.gz
build:
    number: 2
    string: he1b5a44_2
requirements:
    build:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 0_gnu
        - binutils_impl_linux-64 2.34 h2122c62_8
        - binutils_linux-64 2.34 h47ac705_21
        - bzip2 1.0.8 h516909a_2
        - ca-certificates 2020.6.20 hecda079_0
        - cmake 3.18.0 h5c55442_0
        - expat 2.2.9 he1b5a44_2
        - gcc_impl_linux-64 7.5.0 hda68d29_10
        - gcc_linux-64 7.5.0 ha781d05_21
        - gxx_impl_linux-64 7.5.0 h64c220c_10
        - gxx_linux-64 7.5.0 ha781d05_21
        - kernel-headers_linux-64 2.6.32 h77966d4_12
        - krb5 1.17.1 hfafb76e_1
        - ld_impl_linux-64 2.34 hc38a660_8
        - libcurl 7.71.1 hcdd3856_3
        - libedit 3.1.20191231 h46ee950_1
        - libgcc-ng 9.2.0 h24d8f2e_2
        - libgomp 9.2.0 h24d8f2e_2
        - libssh2 1.9.0 hab1572f_4
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.2.0 hdf63c60_2
        - libuv 1.38.0 h516909a_0
        - make 4.3 h516909a_0
        - ncurses 6.2 he1b5a44_1
        - openssl 1.1.1g h516909a_0
        - rhash 1.3.6 h14c3975_1001
        - sysroot_linux-64 2.12 h77966d4_12
        - tk 8.6.10 hed695b0_0
        - xz 5.2.5 h516909a_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h516909a_1006
    host:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 0_gnu
        - libgcc-ng 9.2.0 h24d8f2e_2
        - libgomp 9.2.0 h24d8f2e_2
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.2.0 hdf63c60_2
        - zstd 1.4.5 h6597ccf_2
    run:
        - libgcc-ng >=7.5.0
        - libstdcxx-ng >=7.5.0
        - zstd 1.4.5 h6597ccf_2
test:
    commands:
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libzstd.a
about:
    description: 'Zstandard is a real-time compression algorithm, providing high compression

        ratios. It offers a very wide range of compression / speed trade-off, while

        being backed by a very fast decoder. It also offers a special mode for

        small data, called dictionary compression, and can create dictionaries from

        any sample set. Zstandard library is provided as open source software using

        a BSD license.

        '
    dev_url: https://github.com/facebook/zstd
    doc_url: https://facebook.github.io/zstd/zstd_manual.html
    home: http://www.zstd.net
    license: BSD-3-Clause
    license_file: LICENSE
    summary: Zstandard - Fast real-time compression algorithm
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - msarahan
        - rmax
        - xhochy
